scripts.text:
CREATE TABLE SilverTable (
    name NVARCHAR(MAX),
    address NVARCHAR(MAX),
    city NVARCHAR(MAX),
    state NVARCHAR(MAX),
    postal_code NVARCHAR(MAX),
    stars FLOAT,
    review_count INT,
    categories NVARCHAR(MAX),
    business_id NVARCHAR(50),
    user_id NVARCHAR(50),
    review_id NVARCHAR(50),
    review_stars INT,
    review_time TIME
);
